import.name: Strength
import.description: Perform a save using your muscles and force.

import.name: Dexterity
import.description: Perform a save using your reflexes and speed.

import.name: Constitution
import.description: Perform a save using the fortitude of your body.

import.name: Intelligence
import.description: Perform a save using your knowledge of the world.

import.name: Wisdom
import.description: Perform a save using your ability to understand the world.

import.name: Charisma
import.description: Perform a save against the force of your personality.

import.name: Initiative
import.description: Determine your combat order based on your ability to react and maintain awareness

import.name: Concentration
import.description: Attempt to maintain concentration on a spell after taking damage. The ${DC}$ is half the damage taken.

import.name: Main Hand
import.description: Roll an attack with the weapon in your ${Main Hand}$

import.name: Off Hand
import.description: Roll an attack with the weapon in your ${Off Hand}$

import.name: Acrobatics
import.description: Attempt to move or squirm in someway relying on your ability to control your body

import.name: Animal Handling
import.description: Attempt to manipulate an animal of some kind. This will usually apply to creatures with an ${Intelligence}$ of 4 or lower or otherwise intelligent creatures in a crazed (or similar) state

import.name: Arcana
import.description: Attempt to understand some aspect of magic

import.name: Athletics
import.description: Attempt to perform a feat of ${Strength}$ such as pushing or carrying an object

import.name: Deception
import.description: Attempt to convince another creature of something that you know to not be true or behave in a way that achieves a similar effect

import.name: History
import.description: Attempt to understand or recall something from the past

import.name: Insight
import.description: Attempt to understand the intent of another creature

import.name: Intimidation
import.description: Attempt to scare a creature by threatening it

import.name: Investigation
import.description: Attempt to ascertain information from an area by physically searching it

import.name: Medicine
import.description: Attempt to understand or treat an injury or illness

import.name: Nature
import.description: Attempt to understand some aspect of the land or a plant

import.name: Perception
import.description: Attempt to look over an area and see something of interest

import.name: Performance
import.description: Attempt to manipulate your voice or move your body in a certain way

import.name: Persuasion
import.description: Attempt to convince another creature to do or believe something

import.name: Religion
import.description: Attempt to understand something from a religious perspective, possibly involving a god

import.name: Sleight Of Hand
import.description: Attempt to sneakily perform an action with your hands

import.name: Stealth
import.description: Attempt to slip away from the awareness of near-by creatures

import.name: Survival
import.description: Attempt to understand some aspect of time or your current location

import.name: Disguise Kit
import.description: Attempt to mask your appear using a kit

import.name: Forgery Kit
import.description: Attempt to create fake documents

import.name: Forgery Kit
import.description: Attempt to pick a lock

import.name: Forgery Kit
import.description: Attempt to stabilize an unconscious creature at 0HP

import.name: Artisanal Kit
import.description: Attempt to create an item

import.name: Alchemy Kit
import.description: Attempt to brew something

import.name: Alchemy Kit
import.description: Attempt to create or update a map
